long_description: The Lightload Towels beach towel features unique packaging that compresses it to the size of a hockey puck! Keep a spare towel in your glove box or backpack. Once removed from its packaging, towel expands to a full-size (60 in. x 36 in.) beach towel. Super-absorbent viscose fiber absorbs up to 10 times its weight; material is more absorbent than cotton. Fast-drying material wicks moisture and is reusable; once open, the towel will not fit back into original packaging. Available in assorted colors; sorry, we can't handpick a color for you. Lightload Towels beach towel is machine washable.
